<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage109"></A>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ABBV-20161231XEX105_HTM_SA6CCA3D3DFA1B4E5BCBF3D9D7C106A6A">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ABBVIE
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLAN
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	INTRODUCTION
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 1.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Purpose
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The AbbVie Deferred Compensation Plan (the &#8220;Plan&#8221;) is designed to assist the Employers in attracting and retaining key employees by providing Eligible Employees with the opportunity to defer the receipt of a portion of their compensation and to have that deferred compensation treated as if it were invested pending its distribution by the Plan.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 1.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	ERISA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Plan is intended to be exempt from Parts 2, 3, and 4 of Title I of ERISA and, therefore, participation in the Plan is limited to a select group of management and highly compensated employees, within the meaning of ERISA Sections 201(2), 301(a)(3) and 401(a)(1).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 1.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Employers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;After the Effective Date, any Subsidiary of the Company that is not then an Employer may adopt the Plan with the Company&#8217;s consent as described in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 13.12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Each Employer shall be liable to the Company for an amount equal to the Plan benefits earned by its Eligible Employees. Where an Eligible Employee has been employed by more than one Employer, the Plan Administrator shall allocate the liability to the Company associated with that Eligible Employee&#8217;s Plan benefits among his or her Employers. The Plan Administrator shall establish procedures for determining the time at which and manner in which the Employers shall pay this liability to the Company.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 1.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Effective Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Plan was adopted effective as of January 1, 2013 (the &#8220;Effective Date&#8221;) and amended and restated effective January 1, 2015. The Plan hereby is further amended and restated effective as of January 1, 2017 (the &#8220;Restatement Effective Date&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 1.5&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Transfer of Liabilities from Abbott Laboratories Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. As part of the Separation and Distribution Agreement by and between Abbott Laboratories and AbbVie Inc. dated as of November 28, 2012, Abbott and AbbVie entered into the Employee Matters Agreement dated as of December 31, 2012 (the &#8220;EMA&#8221;). In accordance with the EMA, all liabilities for AbbVie Employees (as defined in the EMA) under the Abbott Laboratories Deferred Compensation Plan were transferred to the Plan and the Plan became liable to pay all such benefits to such participants. Supplement A to the Plan sets forth the additional rules applicable to the transferred benefits and transferred participants.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE II
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	DEFINITIONS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	When used in this Plan, unless the context clearly requires a different meaning, the following words and terms shall have the meanings set forth below. Whenever appropriate, words used in the singular shall be deemed to include the plural, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	vice versa
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, and the masculine gender shall be deemed to include the feminine gender.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Account
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Account(s)&#8221; means the account(s) established for record keeping purposes for each Participant pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Article VI
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Base Compensation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Base Compensation&#8221; means, subject to the last sentence of this Section, the Participant&#8217;s total compensation earned in a Plan Year for personal service actually rendered to an Employer, before deductions for (a)&#160;Deferral Elections made pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;or (b) contributions made on the Participant&#8217;s behalf to any Employer Savings Plan or to any cafeteria plan under Section 125 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (the &#8220;Code&#8221;), maintained by an Employer. &#8220;Base Compensation&#8221; for Plan purposes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	excludes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;Sales-Related Compensation, Eligible Bonuses, all other bonuses, commissions, relocation
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage110"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	expenses, reimbursements, expense allowances, fringe benefits (cash or noncash), welfare benefits (whether or not those amounts are includible in gross income) and other non-regular forms of compensation.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Beneficiary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Beneficiary&#8221; means the person, persons or entity designated by the Participant to receive any benefits payable under the Plan pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Article IX
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Board of Review
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Board of Review&#8221; means the AbbVie Employee Benefit Board of Review appointed by the Company&#8217;s Board of Directors and having the powers and duties described in this Plan.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.5&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Company&#8221; means AbbVie Inc., its successors, any organization into which or with which AbbVie Inc. may merge or consolidate or to which all or substantially all of its assets may be transferred.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.6&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Deferral Election
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Deferral Election&#8221; means an election under the Plan by a Participant to defer the receipt of a portion of his or her Eligible Compensation made on a Deferral Election Form.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.7&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Deferral Election Form
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Deferral Election Form&#8221; means the form or other means provided to the Participant by the Plan pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;through which the Participant makes his or her Deferral Election.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.8&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Deferral Account
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Deferral Account(s)&#8221; means the account(s) established for record keeping purposes for each Participant&#8217;s Deferral Election pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 6.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.9&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Disability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The date of &#8220;Disability&#8221; of a Participant means the date on which the Participant is, by reason of any medically determinable physical or mental impairment that can be expected to result in death or can be expected to last for a continuous period of not less than twelve months, eligible to receive income replacement benefits for a period of six or more months under the terms of the AbbVie Long-Term Disability Plan (&#8220;LTD Plan&#8221;) or, for a Participant whose Employer does not participate in the LTD Plan, such similar accident and health plan in which his or her Employer participates.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.10&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Distribution Election
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Distribution Election&#8221; is defined in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.3(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.11&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Distribution Election Form
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Distribution Election Form&#8221; means the form or other means provided to the Participant by the Plan pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;through which the Participant specifies the time at which the amounts credited to one of the Participant&#8217;s Account(s) are to be distributed and their method of payment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.12&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Effective Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Effective Date&#8221; and &#8220;Restatement Effective Date&#8221; are defined in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 1.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.13&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Eligibility Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Eligibility Date&#8221; is defined in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 3.1(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.14&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Eligible Bonus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Eligible Bonus&#8221; means an annual cash incentive bonus for a Plan Year that the Plan Administrator, or its delegate, has designated as being eligible for deferral under the Plan. As of the Restatement Effective Date, cash bonuses paid to Eligible Employees under the AbbVie Cash Profit Sharing Plan, the AbbVie Incentive Plan, the AbbVie Managerial Incentive Plan, the AbbVie Management Incentive Plan, the AbbVie Performance Incentive Plan, or any other similar Employer-sponsored annual incentive bonus plan with a performance period commencing on January 1 and ending on December 31 of the applicable Plan Year are eligible for deferral under the Plan.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.15&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Eligible Compensation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Eligible Compensation&#8221; means the Participant&#8217;s Base Compensation, Sales-Related Compensation and Eligible Bonus(es).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.16&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Eligible Employee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Eligible Employee&#8221; means any person employed by an Employer who is both:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage111"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;a United States employee or an expatriate who is based and paid in the United States; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;shown as having a grade level of 20 (or equivalent level of compensation if on a different pay grade system) or higher on his or her Employer&#8217;s Human Resource System, provided that, in the case of any person employed by Pharmacyclics LLC, the grade level is Pharmacyclics management level 6 or higher on the Pharmacyclics Human Resource System;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and who is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a) &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;both a corporate officer of the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;designated as eligible to participate in the AbbVie Supplemental Savings Plan, except as contemplated by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 3.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;hereof for the Plan Year in which the person is first named a corporate officer;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;an individual who provides services to an Employer under a contract, arrangement or understanding with either the individual directly or with an agency or leasing organization that treats the individual as either an independent contractor or an employee of such agency or leasing organization, even if such individual is subsequently determined (by an Employer, the Internal Revenue Service, any other governmental agency, judicial action, or otherwise) to have been a common law employee of an Employer rather than an independent contractor or employee of such agency or leasing organization; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c) &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;an Employee who is employed by an Employer located in Puerto Rico, other than a person designated as a &#8220;U.S. Expatriate&#8221; on the records of an Employer.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	For all Plan purposes, an individual shall be an &#8220;Eligible Employee&#8221; for any Plan Year only if during that Plan Year an Employer treats that individual as its employee for purposes of employment taxes and wage withholding for Federal income taxes, even if such individual is subsequently determined (by an Employer, the Internal Revenue Service, any other governmental agency, judicial action, or otherwise) to have been a common law employee of an Employer in that Plan Year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.17&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Employer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Employer&#8221; shall mean the Company, the participating Employers on the Effective Date, and any Subsidiary of the Company that subsequently adopts the Plan in the manner provided in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 13.12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.18&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Employer Contribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Employer Contribution&#8221; means the contribution deemed to have been made by an Employer pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 5.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.19&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Employer Contribution Account
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Employer Contribution Account(s)&#8221; means the account(s) established for record keeping purposes for each Participant&#8217;s Employer Contributions pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 6.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.20&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Employer Savings Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Employer Savings Plan&#8221; means any defined contribution retirement plan that is maintained by an Employer, qualified under Code Section 401(a), and includes a cash or deferred arrangement under Code Section 401(k). The term shall specifically include, but not be limited to, the AbbVie Savings Plan.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.21&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	ERISA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;ERISA&#8221; means the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as amended.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.22&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Hardship Distribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Hardship Distribution&#8221; is defined in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 8.5(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.23&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	In-Service Distribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;In-Service Distribution&#8221; is defined in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.24&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">

</FONT>

	. &#8220;Initial Election&#8221; is defined in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.3(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.25&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Investment Election
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Investment Election&#8221; is defined in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.2(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.26&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Investment Election Form
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Investment Election Form&#8221; means the form or other means provided to the Participant by the Plan pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;through which the Participant specifies the Investment Funds in which the Participant&#8217;s Account(s) are to be deemed to be invested.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.27&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Investment Fund(s)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Investment Fund(s)&#8221; means one or more of the funds selected by the Plan Administrator pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.28&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Investment Fund Subaccounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Investment Fund Subaccounts&#8221; is defined in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 6.1(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.29&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Matching DCP Deferral
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Matching DCP Deferral&#8221; for a Participant for a Plan Year is an amount equal to the total dollar amount of the Participant&#8217;s deferrals for the Plan Year pursuant to Employee Deferral Elections under Section 4.1(b), but in no event shall a Participant&#8217;s Matching DCP Deferral for a Plan Year exceed the amount by which (a) the total of the Participant&#8217;s Base Compensation plus Sales-Related Compensation for the Plan Year up to the limit on compensation as defined in Code Section 401(a)(17) exceeds (b) the total of the Participant&#8217;s Base Compensation plus Sales-Related Compensation for the Plan Year less the total dollar amount deferred pursuant to Employee Deferral Elections under Section 4.1(b) for the Plan Year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.30&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Participant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Participant&#8221; means any Eligible Employee who elects to participate in this Plan by filing a Deferral Election, Investment Fund Election, and Distribution Election as provided in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Article IV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	or is a Transferred Participant or a Post-Distribution Participant.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.31&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Plan&#8221; means this AbbVie Deferred Compensation Plan.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.32&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Plan Administrator
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Plan Administrator&#8221; means the Board of Review.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.33&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Plan Year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Plan Year&#8221; means a twelve-month period beginning January 1 and ending the following December 31.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.34&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Post-Distribution Participant.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;&#32;&#8220;Post-Distribution Participant&#8221; means: (a) a Post-Distribution AbbVie Employee (as defined in the EMA) who (i)&#160;was an employee of Abbott or its subsidiary as of immediately prior to the Separation (as defined in the Separation Agreement) and is transferred to or hired by AbbVie or its Subsidiary after the Separation (as defined in the Separation Agreement), and (ii)&#160;had the liabilities associated with his or her account balances in the Abbott Deferred Compensation transferred to this Plan in accordance with Supplement A; and (b) any other individual on whose behalf liabilities are transferred from the Abbott Deferred Compensation Plan to the Plan in accordance with Supplement A in connection with an employment transfer during the Transition Period (as defined in the EMA).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.35&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Rate of Return
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Rate of Return&#8221; means, for each Investment Fund, an amount equal to the net gain or net loss (expressed as a percentage) on the assets of that Investment Fund.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.36&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Retirement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Retirement&#8221; means a Participant&#8217;s Termination of Employment after he or she has satisfied the age and service requirements of subsection (a), (b) or (c) below, as applicable:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;With respect to Participants covered by the AbbVie Pension Plan (the &#8220;Pension Plan&#8221;):
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;for any Transferred Participant or Post-Distribution Participant who has an Old Formula Benefit (as defined in the Pension Plan), the date on which the Participant attains age 50 with 10 years of &#8220;vesting service&#8221; (as such term is described in the Pension Plan); or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
