<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage113"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;for any Transferred Participant or Post-Distribution Participant who does not have an Old Formula Benefit (as defined in the Pension Plan) under the Pension Plan and any Participant covered by the Pension Plan who does not fall into the preceding categories and was hired by AbbVie on or after the Effective Date, the date on which the Participant attains age 55 with 10 years of &#8220;vesting service&#8221; (as such term is described in the Pension Plan).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;With respect to Participants covered by the AbbVie Pension Plan for Former BASF and Former Solvay Employees, the date on which the Participant attains age 55 with 5 years of &#8220;vesting service&#8221; (as such term is described in the AbbVie Pension Plan for Former BASF and Former Solvay Employees).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;With respect to Participants who are not covered by the Pension Plan or the AbbVie Pension Plan for Former BASF and Former Solvay Employees, the date on which the Participant attains age 55 with 10 years of service.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	For purposes of calculating service under this Section 2.36, except as otherwise defined in the applicable plan referenced above or as otherwise provided by the Plan Administrator or its delegate: (A)&#160;service is earned only if it is performed for a member of the AbbVie Inc. controlled group while that controlled group member is a part of the controlled group; (B)&#160;for Employees who transferred to the Company directly from Abbott Laboratories during the period from January 1, 2013 through June 30, 2015 either as a result of the Company&#8217;s spin-off from Abbott Laboratories or with the consent of each company&#8217;s head of human resources, service includes service with Abbott Laboratories that is counted for benefit calculation purposes under the AbbVie Pension Plan, the AbbVie Pension Plan for Former BASF and Former Solvay Employees, or another Company-sponsored pension plan, as applicable; and (C)&#160;service for a Participant employed by Pharmacyclics LLC includes service with Pharmacyclics, Inc. and its subsidiaries earned prior to the date of acquisition by the Company, provided that the Participant was employed by Pharmacyclics, Inc. or its subsidiary on May 26, 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.37&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sales-Related Compensation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Sales-Related Compensation&#8221; means, subject to the last sentence of this Section, the Participant&#8217;s sales bonuses, sales incentives and sales commissions earned in a Plan Year from an Employer, before deductions for (a)&#160;Deferral Elections made pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;or (b) contributions made on the Participant&#8217;s behalf to any Employer Savings Plan or to any cafeteria plan under Code Section 125 maintained by an Employer. &#8220;Sales-Related Compensation&#8221; for Plan purposes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	excludes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;Base Compensation, Eligible Bonuses, and all other compensation not specifically categorized as a sales bonus, sales incentive or sales commission.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.38&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Separation Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Separation Date&#8221; has the meaning set forth in the Separation Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.39&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Subsequent Election
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Subsequent Election&#8221; is defined in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.3(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.40&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Subsidiary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Subsidiary&#8221; means any corporation, limited liability company, partnership, joint venture, or business trust organized in the United States 50 percent or more of the voting stock of which is owned, directly or indirectly, by the Company.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.41&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Termination of Employment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Termination of Employment&#8221; means the cessation of a Participant&#8217;s services as an employee, whether voluntary or involuntary, for any reason other than death; provided, that the Participant shall not be considered to have terminated employment for purposes of the Plan until he or she would be considered to have incurred a &#8220;separation from service&#8221; from the Employer within the meaning of Code Section 409A.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.42&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Transferred Participant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Transferred Participant&#8221; means an AbbVie Employee (as defined in the EMA), excluding a Post-Distribution AbbVie Employee (as defined in the EMA), who accepts an offer of employment or continues employment with or is transferred to AbbVie or one of its Subsidiaries under the Separation Agreement on or immediately after the Separation Date.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage114"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2.43&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Unforeseeable Emergency
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &#8220;Unforeseeable Emergency&#8221; means a severe financial hardship to the Participant resulting from an illness or accident of the Participant, the Participant&#8217;s spouse or a dependent of the Participant, loss of the Participant&#8217;s property due to casualty (including the need to rebuild a home following damage to a home not otherwise covered by insurance, for example, not as a result of a natural disaster), or other similar extraordinary and unforeseeable circumstances arising as a result of events beyond the control of the Participant as determined by the Plan Administrator.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE III
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	PARTICIPATION
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 3.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Participation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Except as provided in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 3.1(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, an Eligible Employee may become a Participant by making a Deferral Election, Investment Fund Election, and Distribution Election pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Article IV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;on or before the deadline set by the Plan Administrator pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;A newly hired individual who is an Eligible Employee shall become eligible to participate in the Plan on the first day of the month next following the month after the individual&#8217;s date of hire (the &#8220;Eligibility Date&#8221;);
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;that in no event shall such individual begin to participate in the plan later than 90 days following his or her date of hire. Notwithstanding the election requirements of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 3.1(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, a newly Eligible Employee who was not eligible to participate in any other plan that would be aggregated with the Plan under Treasury Regulation &#167;1.409A-1(c) may make a Deferral Election, Investment Fund Election and Distribution Election pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Article IV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	within the 30-day period immediately following the Eligibility Date. Any such election shall become effective for Eligible Compensation earned no earlier than the first payroll period commencing after receipt of the election by the Plan Administrator and shall be irrevocable for the remainder of the Plan Year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;An individual who becomes an Eligible Employee as a result of a job promotion or transfer may make a Deferral Election, Investment Fund Election and Distribution Election pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Article IV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;only with respect to Eligible Compensation to be earned in the Plan Year next following the year of such promotion or transfer. Any such election shall be made in accordance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Article IV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and shall become effective for Eligible Compensation earned in the Plan Year following the year in which the election is made.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Participation of Transferred Participants and Post-Distribution Participants shall be governed by Supplement A.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 3.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Termination of Participation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. A Participant who ceases to be an Eligible Employee due to a Termination of Employment will remain a Participant but (i) may no longer make Deferral Elections with respect to any Plan Year following the year of such termination and (ii) all deferrals under the Plan shall cease as of the date of the Participant&#8217;s Termination of Employment. A Participant who ceases to be an Eligible Employee due to a job promotion (or demotion) may no longer make Deferral Elections with respect to any Plan Year following the year of such promotion or demotion but the Participant&#8217;s Deferral Elections for the Plan Year in which such promotion or demotion occurs shall remain irrevocable. A Participant shall remain a Participant until (i) his or her death or (ii) his or her Accounts have been distributed.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE IV
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ELECTION FORMS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 4.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Deferral Elections
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Participants shall make their Deferral Elections annually on a form or by other means provided by the Plan Administrator (a &#8220;Deferral Election Form&#8221;). Each Deferral Election shall apply to only a single Plan Year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;On his or her Deferral Election Form, the Participant shall specify the amount (expressed as a percentage) of his or her Base Compensation, the amount (expressed as a percentage) of his or her Sales-Related
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage115"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Compensation, and the amount (expressed as a percentage) of his or her Eligible Bonuses that the Participant elects to defer for that Plan Year together with such other information as the Plan Administrator may, in its sole and absolute discretion, require.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;For any Plan Year, a Participant may elect to defer:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;five percent (5%) to seventy-five percent (75%) of his or her Base Compensation (in whole percentage increments),
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;five percent (5%) to seventy-five percent (75%) of his or her Sales-Related Compensation (in whole percentage increments), and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;five percent (5%) to seventy-five percent (75%) of his or her Eligible Bonus(es) (in whole percentage increments);
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	provided, however, that in no event may a Participant elect to defer his or her Eligible Compensation to the extent that his or her remaining compensation would be insufficient to satisfy all applicable withholding taxes and contributions required under Employer-sponsored benefit plans in which the Participant participates.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;A Participant may not revoke his or her Deferral Election at any time after the deadline for making such Deferral Election set by the Plan Administrator pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 4.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Investment Elections
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Plan Administrator shall, from time to time, make available investment options (the &#8220;Investment Funds&#8221;) that serve as benchmark funds for the amounts a Participant defers under the Plan. A Participant&#8217;s Plan deferrals shall not actually be invested in the Investment Funds and the Participant shall not be considered a shareholder of any of the Investment Funds he or she selects by virtue of participation in the Plan. Instead, the Participant&#8217;s Plan deferrals shall be considered invested in, and his or her Plan Account shall reflect such Investment Fund&#8217;s Rate of Return. A Participant&#8217;s election of investments shall be subject to the following rules:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Participants shall make their investment elections on an Investment Election Form or by other means provided by the Plan Administrator (an &#8220;Investment Election&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Investment Election Form completed by the Participant shall apply only to the Eligible Compensation being deferred in a single Plan Year and shall specify the Investment Funds in which the deferrals for each such Plan Year are to be deemed to be invested, and the portion (expressed in whole percentage increments) of the deferrals for such Plan Year that are to be deemed to be invested in each such Investment Fund, and shall continue in effect until revoked or changed as permitted by the Plan Administrator.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 4.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Distribution Elections
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Participants shall make their distribution elections in accordance with the Distribution Election Form or by other means provided by the Plan Administrator (a &#8220;Distribution Election&#8221;). Each Distribution Election (the &#8220;Initial Election&#8221;) shall apply only to the Eligible Compensation being deferred in a single Plan Year and must be made by the deadline set by the Plan Administrator pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, at which time the Initial Election shall be irrevocable, subject to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.3(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;On the Distribution Election Form:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Mandatory Retirement Election
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. In all cases, the Participant shall select the method of payment from among the methods of payment described in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 8.3(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to apply in the event payment is made upon Retirement pursuant to this Distribution Election in accordance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 8.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;8.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;or upon Disability in accordance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 8.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage116"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Optional In-Service Distribution Election
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Participant shall also have the option to elect that the Eligible Compensation being deferred for that Plan Year shall be paid to the Participant while he or she is still employed by an Employer (an &#8220;In-Service Distribution&#8221;). If the Participant elects to receive an In-Service Distribution of the Eligible Compensation being deferred, then the Participant shall also select the year in which the payments are to be made. A Participant may not elect to receive an In-Service Distribution in a Plan Year that is less than two (2) years after the end of the Plan Year in which the Eligible Compensation is earned.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, a Participant may change the form of distribution or his or her Distribution Election (a &#8220;Subsequent Election&#8221;) to the extent permitted by the Plan Administrator and Code Section 409A(a)(4)(C), including the requirements that such Subsequent Election:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;shall not take effect until at least 12 months after the date on which the Subsequent Election is filed with the Plan Administrator;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;shall result in the first distribution subject to such Subsequent Election being made at least five years after the date such distribution would otherwise have been paid pursuant to the previous election; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;shall be filed with the Plan Administrator at least 12 months before the date the first scheduled distribution is to be paid pursuant to the previous election.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 4.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Deadline for Submitting Election Forms
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Plan Administrator may set a deadline or deadlines for the receipt of the election forms required under the Plan; provided, however, that, except as provided in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 3.1(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, such forms must be filed on or before the end of the year immediately preceding the Plan Year for which it is to be effective.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE V
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EMPLOYER CONTRIBUTIONS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 5.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Employer Contributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Each Participant who makes a Deferral Election will be credited with an Employer Contribution equal to 5% of the Participant&#8217;s Matching DCP Deferral. The Plan Administrator may, however, in his or her discretion, otherwise set the amount of the Employer Contribution, subject to and not in excess of applicable limits imposed by the Internal Revenue Service.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 5.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Allocation of Employer Contributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. A Participant&#8217;s Employer Contribution for a Plan Year shall be allocated among the same Investment Funds and in the same proportion as the Participant has elected for his or her deferrals for that Plan Year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 5.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Distribution of Employer Contributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. An Employer Contribution for a Plan Year shall be distributed to the Participant according to the election made by the Participant governing his or her deferrals for that same Plan Year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE VI
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MAINTENANCE AND CREDITING OF ACCOUNTS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 6.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Maintenance of Accounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Plan shall maintain a separate Account for each Deferral Election (a &#8220;Deferral Account&#8221;) made by a Participant and each Employer Contribution (an &#8220;Employer Contribution Account&#8221;) made for a Participant. A Participant&#8217;s Accounts shall reflect the Participant&#8217;s Investment Fund Elections and Distribution Elections made pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Article IV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, any Employer Contributions made on behalf of the Participant pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Article V
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, adjustments to the Account made pursuant to this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Article VI
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, and distributions made with respect to the Account pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Article VIII
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Accounts shall be used solely as a device for the measurement and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage117"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	determination of the amounts to be paid to the Participants pursuant to this Plan and shall not constitute or be treated as a trust fund of any kind.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Each Account shall be divided into separate subaccounts (&#8220;Investment Fund Subaccounts&#8221;), each of which corresponds to the Investment Fund selected by the Participant pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.2(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 6.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Crediting of Accounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;No later than five (5) business days following the end of each pay period, the Plan shall credit each Participant&#8217;s Investment Fund Subaccounts to reflect amounts deferred from the Participant&#8217;s Eligible Compensation during that pay period and the Investment Fund Election made by the Participant with respect to that Eligible Compensation.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;At the end of each Plan Year, the Plan shall credit each Participant&#8217;s Investment Fund Subaccounts to reflect any Employer Contribution deemed to have been made on behalf of the Participant for that Plan Year and the allocation of that contribution among the Investment Funds pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Plan Administrator shall adjust each Investment Fund Subaccount to reflect any transfers under the Plan to or from that Investment Fund Subaccount, as of the end of each business day to reflect any distributions under the Plan made with respect to that Investment Fund Subaccount, and the Rate of Return on the related Investment Fund.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 6.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Statement of Accounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Each Participant shall be issued quarterly statements of his or her Account(s) in such form as the Plan Administrator deems desirable, setting forth the balance to the credit of such Participant in his or her Account(s) as of the end of the most recently completed quarter.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE VII
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	VESTING AND FORFEITURES
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 7.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Deferral Accounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. A Participant&#8217;s Deferral Accounts shall be one hundred percent (100%) vested and non-forfeitable at all times.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 7.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Employer Contribution Account
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;For a Participant employed by an Employer other than Pharmacyclics LLC:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Participant&#8217;s Employer Contribution Account shall become one hundred percent (100%) vested and non-forfeitable when matching contributions made by the Participant&#8217;s Employer on behalf of the Participant under the AbbVie Savings Plan become (or would become, if matching contributions are not made) one hundred percent (100%) vested and non-forfeitable.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;If the Participant&#8217;s employment with the Employers terminates (whether voluntarily or involuntarily) before the matching contributions made by the Participant&#8217;s Employer on behalf of the Participant under the AbbVie Savings Plan become (or would become, if matching contributions are not made) one hundred percent (100%) vested and non-forfeitable, then the Participant shall forfeit his or her Employer Contribution Account.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;For a Participant employed by Pharmacyclics LLC:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Participant&#8217;s Employer Contribution Account shall become one hundred percent (100%) vested and non-forfeitable when the Participant completes two (2) Years of Credited Service, as defined in the AbbVie Savings Plan. For purposes of this Section 7.2(b) and the determination of Years of Credited Service, a Participant will receive credit for service he or she completes with Pharmacyclics LLC (including its predecessor, Pharmacyclics, Inc., and its subsidiaries earned prior to the date of acquisition
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage118"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	by the Company, provided that the Participant was employed by Pharmacyclics, Inc. or its subsidiary on May 26, 2015).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;If the Participant&#8217;s employment with the Employers terminates (whether voluntarily or involuntarily) before his or her Employer Contribution Account becomes one hundred percent (100%) vested and non-forfeitable as described in paragraph (b)(i) above, then the Participant shall forfeit his or her Employer Contribution Account.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE VIII
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	DISTRIBUTION OF BENEFITS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 8.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Distribution of Benefits in the Event of a Termination of Employment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. If a Participant elects to receive his or her Plan benefits as an In-Service Distribution, then in the event of that Participant&#8217;s Termination of Employment (other than due to Retirement) prior to receiving that In-Service Distribution, the Company shall pay that Participant&#8217;s Plan benefits in a lump-sum to the Participant within 90 days following his or her Termination of Employment. If a Participant elects to receive his or her Plan benefits upon Retirement, then in the event of that Participant&#8217;s Termination of Employment prior to the date the Participant attains eligibility for Retirement, the Company shall pay that Participant&#8217;s Plan benefits in a lump-sum to the Participant within 90 days following his or her Termination of Employment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 8.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	In-Service Distributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Subject to the provisions of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 8.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, the Company shall pay In-Service Distributions in a lump-sum to the Participant on the first business day in February of the year designated by the Participant on his or her Distribution Election Form.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 8.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Distribution of Benefits in the Event of Retirement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;If, pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, a Participant has elected to receive his or her Plan benefits for a Plan Year upon his or her Retirement, then the Company shall pay the Participant his or her Plan benefits commencing on the first business day in February next following the date of the Participant&#8217;s Retirement in any of the following forms pursuant to the Participant&#8217;s Initial Election or Subsequent Election, as applicable:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;in substantially equal quarterly or annual installments to the Participant over fifteen (15) years; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;in substantially equal quarterly or annual installments to the Participant over ten (10) years; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;in substantially equal quarterly or annual installments to the Participant over five (5) years; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iv)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;in a lump sum; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(v)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;if no such election is on file with the Plan Administrator, in substantially equal quarterly installments to the Participant over ten (10) years.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Quarterly installments shall be paid on the first business day of each calendar quarter and annual installments shall be paid on the first business day of each calendar year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Notwithstanding the provisions of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 8.3(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, in the event that, as of the date of the Participant&#8217;s Retirement, the Participant&#8217;s benefits under the Plan do not exceed, in the aggregate, $15,500, the Participant&#8217;s benefits shall be paid to the Participant in a lump sum.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage119"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 8.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Distribution of Benefits on the Earlier to Occur of a Participant&#8217;s Retirement or a Specified Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If a Participant has elected to receive his or her Plan benefits on a specified date pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.3(b)(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, if the Participant&#8217;s Retirement occurs prior to such specified date,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;For amounts deferred for a Transferred Participant or a Post-Distribution Participant with respect to Plan Years beginning prior to January 1, 2008, the Company shall pay the Transferred Participant or the Post-Distribution Participant his or her Plan benefits in a lump sum on the first business day in February next following the Participant&#8217;s Retirement; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;For amounts deferred for a Transferred Participant or a Post-Distribution Participant with respect to Plan Years beginning on or after January 1, 2008, and for amounts deferred for a Participant hired by an Employer on or after the Effective Date of the Plan, the Company shall pay the Participant his or her Plan benefits in accordance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 8.3(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, subject to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 8.3(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 8.5&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Distributions Due to Unforeseeable Emergency
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;A Participant may receive the early payment of all or part of the balance in his or her Account(s) in the event of an Unforeseeable Emergency (a &#8220;Hardship Distribution&#8221;) subject to the following restrictions:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Participant has requested the Hardship Distribution from the Plan Administrator on a form provided by or in the format requested by the Plan Administrator;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Plan Administrator has determined that an Unforeseeable Emergency has occurred;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Plan Administrator determines the amount of the Hardship Distribution, which amount will be limited to the amount reasonably necessary to satisfy the emergency need (including any amounts necessary to pay any Federal, state, local or foreign income taxes or penalties reasonably anticipated to result from the Hardship Distribution); and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iv)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Hardship Distribution shall be distributed in a lump sum within 30 days following determination by the Plan Administrator of the amount of the Hardship Distribution.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The circumstances that would constitute a Unforeseeable Emergency will depend on the facts and circumstances of each case, but, in any case, a Hardship Distribution may not be made to the extent that such hardship may be relieved through (i) reimbursement or compensation by insurance or otherwise, (ii) liquidation of the Participant&#8217;s assets, to the extent that liquidation of the Participant&#8217;s assets would not itself cause severe financial hardship, or (iii)&#160;by cessation of deferrals under this Plan in compliance with Code Section 409A.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 8.6&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Distribution of Benefits in the Event of Death
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. In the event of a Participant&#8217;s death prior to the complete distribution of his or her Accounts, the Company shall distribute his or her total Plan benefits to his or her Beneficiary in a lump sum within 90 days after the date of the Participant&#8217;s death.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 8.7&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Distribution of Benefits in the Event of Disability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. In the event of a Participant&#8217;s Disability, the Company shall pay the Participant his or her Plan benefits commencing on the first business day in February next following the date of the Participant&#8217;s Disability in the form set forth below:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;For any Participant who has elected to receive his or her Plan benefits upon Retirement, pursuant to the Participant&#8217;s Distribution Election to receive his or her Plan benefits in one of the Retirement forms permitted under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 8.3(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, subject to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 8.3(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;For a Participant who has elected to receive his or her Plan benefits as an In-Service Distribution, if the Participant&#8217;s Disability occurs prior to the date specified in such Distribution Election:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	11
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage120"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;For amounts deferred for a Transferred Participant or a Post-Distribution Participant with respect to Plan Years beginning on or subsequent to January 1, 2008, or for amounts deferred for a Participant hired by an Employer on or after the Effective Date of the Plan, pursuant to the Participant&#8217;s Distribution Election to receive his or her Plan benefits in one of the Retirement forms permitted under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 8.3(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, subject to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 8.3(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;For amounts deferred for a Transferred Participant or a Post-Distribution Participant with respect to all Plan Years beginning prior to January 1, 2008, pursuant to the Participant&#8217;s Distribution Election to receive his or her Plan benefits in a lump sum under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.3(b)(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 8.8&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Postponing or Amending Distributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. A Participant may postpone a scheduled distribution or amend the form of distribution specified in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 8.2,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 8.3(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 8.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;only by making a Subsequent Election pursuant to the terms of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 4.3(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 8.9&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Distribution of Benefits Pursuant to a Domestic Relations Order
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Company shall pay all or a portion of a Participant&#8217;s Plan benefits in a lump sum to any person other than the Participant pursuant to the terms of a domestic relations order. For this purpose, a domestic relations order means a judgment, decree or order (including approval of a property settlement agreement) which relates to the provision of child support, alimony payments, or marital property rights to a spouse, former spouse, child or other dependent of the Participant and which is made pursuant to a state domestic relations law (including a community property law).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE IX
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	BENEFICIARY DESIGNATION
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 9.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Beneficiary Designation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Each Participant shall have the right, at any time, to designate any person, persons or entity as his or her Beneficiary or Beneficiaries. A Beneficiary designation shall be made, and may be amended, by the Participant by filing a designation with the Plan Administrator, on such form and in accordance with such procedures as the Plan Administrator may establish from time to time.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 9.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Failure to Designate a Beneficiary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. If a Participant or Beneficiary fails to designate a Beneficiary as provided above, or if all designated Beneficiaries predecease the Participant or his or her Beneficiary, then the Participant&#8217;s Beneficiary shall be deemed to be, in the following order:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to the spouse of such person, if any; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to the deceased person&#8217;s estate.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 9.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Facility of Payment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. When, in the Plan Administrator&#8217;s opinion, a Participant or Beneficiary is under a legal disability or is incapacitated in any way so as to be unable to manage his or her financial affairs, the Plan Administrator may make any benefit payments to the Participant or Beneficiary&#8217;s legal representative, or spouse, or the Plan Administrator may apply the payment for the benefit of the Participant or Beneficiary in any way the Plan Administrator considers advisable, in each case, without subjecting the Participant or Beneficiary to accelerated taxation and/or tax penalties under Code Section 409A.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE X
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ADMINISTRATION OF PLAN
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 10.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Plan Administrator
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Board of Review, or such person as the Board of Review shall designate pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 10.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	shall serve as the Plan Administrator of the Plan. The administration of the Plan shall be under the supervision of the Plan Administrator. It shall be a principal duty of the Plan Administrator to see that the Plan is carried out, in accordance with its terms, for the exclusive benefit of persons entitled to participate in the Plan without discrimination
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	among them. Benefits under the Plan shall be paid only if the Plan Administrator decides, in his or her discretion, that the applicant is entitled to them. The Plan Administrator will have full power to administer the Plan in all of its details, subject to applicable requirements of law. For this purpose, the Plan
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage121"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Administrator&#8217;s powers will include but will not be limited to, the following authority, in addition to all other powers provided by this Plan:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	To make and enforce such rules and regulations as it deems necessary or proper for the efficient administration of the Plan, including the establishment of any claims procedures that may be required by applicable provisions of law;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	To exercise discretion in interpreting the Plan, any interpretation to be reviewed under the arbitrary and capricious standard;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	To exercise discretion in deciding all questions concerning the Plan and the eligibility of any person to participate in the Plan; such decision to be reviewed under the arbitrary and capricious standard;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	To appoint such agents, counsel, accountants, consultants and other persons as may be required to assist in administering the Plan;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	To allocate and delegate its responsibilities under the Plan and to designate other persons to carry out any of its responsibilities under the Plan, any such allocations, delegation or designation to be in writing;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	To determine the amount and type of benefits to which any Participant or Beneficiary shall be entitled hereunder, including the method and date for all valuations under the Plan;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(g)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	To receive from the Employers and from Participants such information as shall be necessary for the proper administration of the Plan or any of its programs;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
